function.name: colorTemperatureMode-setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the color temperature mode of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the color temperature mode.

predefinedColorTemperatureMode.description: The predefined color temperature mode to set on the device, such as warm or cool mode.
